home.tagline: Building stronger communities through collaboration and resource sharing
home.description: CommuniTree is a platform that helps communities connect, share resources, and work together towards a more sustainable future.

features.communityDesc: Connect with neighbors and build lasting relationships within your local community.
features.resourcesDesc: Share and borrow resources efficiently, reducing waste and building trust.
features.sustainableDesc: Work together towards environmental and social sustainability goals.

error.title: Error {code}

error.forbidden: You don't have permission to access this page.
error.unauthorized: Please log in to access this page.
